message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.NE, cs.CV 

The paper proposes a new simulation-based search method that adapts a neural network simulation policy online via policy gradient updates. This method is compared to Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) and is applied to the game of Hex. Therefore, the most likely categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses game theory (cs.GT) and neural networks (cs.NE) which are relevant sub-categories. Additionally, the paper uses computer vision techniques to visualize the game of Hex, so cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is also a possible sub-category.
